Transparency.justification: Score = 1 because 5 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Synchrony Sparks Shopping Inspo Powered By Gen AI
relevantSources.summary: Details Synchrony's first direct-to-consumer Gen AI-powered tool designed to inspire shoppers in their home furnishing discovery journey, explaining how the technology works and its implementation.

relevantSources.title: Explore Synchrony's Innovative Vision for the Future
relevantSources.summary: Describes Synchrony's Gen AI-powered search tool that enables thematic product discovery in their Marketplace, showing transparency in how AI is being used in customer-facing applications.

relevantSources.title: Synchrony Harnesses AI to Transform Customer Experience
relevantSources.summary: Explains how Synchrony uses machine learning models to help customers get easier access to credit and provide personalized responses to cardholders' queries in real-time.

relevantSources.title: AI is Radically Changing the Retail Landscape
relevantSources.summary: Discusses how artificial intelligence is changing the way consumers shop and buy, from making credit decisions faster to allowing voice-based purchasing.

relevantSources.title: Harnessing AI to Transform the Customer Experience
relevantSources.summary: Outlines Synchrony's AI-powered tools throughout the credit cycle, including their platform for real-time machine learning models designed for credit decisions.

Transparency.findings: Synchrony Financial provides detailed, public explanations of how its AI tools function in consumer-facing applications, including generative AI-powered product discovery and real-time credit decisioning. These sources outline specific AI capabilities, implementation details, and the impact on customer experience, demonstrating a high degree of operational transparency.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.justification: Score = 1 because 5 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: How AI is revolutionizing financial services | CIO Africa
relevantSources.summary: Discusses Synchrony's approach to reducing bias in AI models, including their focus on building diverse teams to identify bias in data and ensure fairness in credit decisions.

relevantSources.title: Black Loans Matter: Fighting Bias for AI Fairness in Lending
relevantSources.summary: Evaluates AI fairness challenges in lending with reference to financial services companies like Synchrony, focusing on group fairness approaches and distributionally robust fairness methods.

relevantSources.title: ESG Report 2022 - Synchrony
relevantSources.summary: Details Synchrony's fair lending practices and compliance framework, including training on fair lending and transparency for suppliers and retail partners who interact with Synchrony customers.

relevantSources.title: Explainability & Fairness in Machine Learning for Credit Underwriting
relevantSources.summary: Examines fairness techniques in machine learning for credit underwriting, discussing how ML technologies can improve fairness and inclusion by giving lenders a more robust toolkit for mitigating disparities.

relevantSources.title: Importance of Interpretable AI in Financial Service Industry - nCino
relevantSources.summary: Presents a case study of how interpretable AI models help financial institutions identify and correct biases inherent in models, ensuring loan approval decisions are fair and do not discriminate against any group unlawfully.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.findings: Synchrony Financial demonstrates a concrete commitment to fairness and bias mitigation through published fair lending practices, training, and the use of specific bias mitigation techniques in AI models. Multiple sources reference their efforts to identify, measure, and address bias in credit decisioning, supported by industry research and compliance documentation.

Explainability.justification: Score = 1 because 5 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: How AI is revolutionizing financial services | CIO Africa
relevantSources.summary: Discusses Synchrony's efforts to build explainability into their AI models, pointing to the reasons why credit decisions are made to ensure transparency and compliance with regulations.

relevantSources.title: Explainability & Fairness in Machine Learning for Credit Underwriting
relevantSources.summary: Examines explainability techniques in machine learning for credit underwriting, including feature importance techniques like SHAP and surrogate models like LIME that can be used to explain AI decisions.

relevantSources.title: Synchrony Harnesses AI to Transform Customer Experience
relevantSources.summary: Details Synchrony's AI-based platform for credit decisions, explaining how machine learning models are designed to facilitate credit-driven decisions while providing a more seamless front-end experience for consumers.

relevantSources.title: Importance of Interpretable AI in Financial Service Industry - nCino
relevantSources.summary: Explains how interpretable AI models equip financial institutions with the ability to offer transparent explanations to customers about how credit decisions are made, enhancing customer experience and trust.

relevantSources.title: PRE 14A - 04/12/2024 - Synchrony Financial
relevantSources.summary: Outlines Synchrony's governance and risk management framework, including how they've improved credit decisions in the application process while maintaining approval rates and protecting risk-based discipline.

Explainability.findings: Synchrony Financial provides concrete evidence of explainability in its AI systems, with public resources describing the use of interpretable models, explainability techniques, and transparent credit decision processes. These efforts are aimed at enhancing regulatory compliance, customer trust, and clarity in automated decision-making.

Human Oversight & Accountability.justification: Score = 1 because 5 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Synchrony's Rachel Moore On Where to Use AI… - LinkedIn
relevantSources.summary: Discusses Synchrony's approach to AI governance, including creating an AI council to oversee responsible development and deployment of AI technologies.

relevantSources.title: Human in the loop: Oversight in the age of AI-powered banking
relevantSources.summary: Explains how human oversight remains crucial for accuracy, fairness, and compliance as AI use cases expand in financial services.

relevantSources.title: Synchrony minds HR as it develops AI | American Banker
relevantSources.summary: Details how Synchrony is conscientiously approaching AI deployment with consideration for how these implementations will affect employees and customers.

relevantSources.title: Agentic AI: Enhancing Enterprise Workflows in 2025
relevantSources.summary: Highlights Synchrony's 'responsible AI' working group and their charter to ensure AI use cases match what Synchrony wants them to be, emphasizing human-in-the-loop approaches.

relevantSources.title: ENVIRONMENTAL, SOCIAL AND GOVERNANCE REPORT 2023
relevantSources.summary: Outlines Synchrony's Board of Directors' oversight structure, including how various committees oversee risk management, compliance, and technology matters that would extend to AI systems.

Human Oversight & Accountability.findings: Synchrony Financial has established formal human oversight structures for AI, including an AI council, board-level oversight, and a responsible AI working group. These bodies are tasked with ensuring responsible development, deployment, and alignment of AI systems with company values, with clear attention to employee and customer impact.

Privacy & Security.justification: Score = 1 because 5 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Privacy Policy - Synchrony
relevantSources.summary: Outlines Synchrony's privacy practices, including how they collect, use, and protect personal information, with specific sections addressing data sharing and security measures.

relevantSources.title: How Identity Thieves Work: Protect Your Information - Synchrony
relevantSources.summary: Explains how Synchrony helps protect customer information from identity theft, including details on what information thieves target and how to safeguard personal data.

relevantSources.title: How To Protect Yourself From AI Fraud and Scams in Banking
relevantSources.summary: Discusses how AI is changing approaches to fraud prevention and security in banking, with guidance on protecting against AI-powered scams.

relevantSources.title: AI/ML Lifts Synchrony Fraud Detection Accuracy to 90%
relevantSources.summary: Details how Synchrony's AI ecosystem achieves 90% accuracy in fraud detection using machine learning and automated decision-making.

relevantSources.title: Synchrony on How AI and ML Can Help FIs Combat Fraud and Deliver Frictionless Customer Experiences
relevantSources.summary: Explains how Synchrony uses AI and machine learning to combat fraud while delivering frictionless customer experiences.

Privacy & Security.findings: Synchrony Financial provides comprehensive public information on its privacy and security practices, including details about personal data protection, AI-driven fraud prevention, and security measures. These sources demonstrate both policy-level and technical approaches to safeguarding customer information in the context of AI.

Governance & Accountability.justification: Score = 1 because 5 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: Synchrony's Rachel Moore On Where to Use AI… - LinkedIn
relevantSources.summary: Discusses Synchrony's approach to AI governance, including creating an AI council to oversee responsible development and deployment of AI technologies.

relevantSources.title: Justin Heller, CDO at Synchrony: Data Strategy, Governance & Driving Business Outcomes
relevantSources.summary: Features Synchrony's Chief Data Officer discussing data governance practices, including the power of automation and AI in managing data at scale.

relevantSources.title: Inside look: Synchrony's AI training strategy - Bank Automation News
relevantSources.summary: Details Synchrony's investment in training employees on AI and automation, with specific programs focused on responsible AI implementation.

relevantSources.title: Synchrony Financial Supplier Code of Conduct
relevantSources.summary: Outlines Synchrony's ethical standards and compliance expectations for suppliers, which would extend to AI-related services and products.

relevantSources.title: Exploring the Use of Generative AI at Synchrony
relevantSources.summary: Describes Synchrony's structured approach to developing a Generative AI program through test-and-learn methodology and a goal-driven framework.

Governance & Accountability.findings: Synchrony Financial demonstrates a robust governance and accountability framework for AI, including an AI council, executive oversight, employee training, and supplier compliance requirements. These measures are documented in public sources and reflect a structured, multi-level approach to responsible AI management.

Public Commitments & External Audits.justification: Score = 1 because 5 source(s) (listed below) contain detailed, verifiable information.

relevantSources.title: ESG Report 2022 - Synchrony
relevantSources.summary: Details Synchrony's ESG initiatives including regular engagement of external experts to evaluate and validate their controls, which would extend to AI systems.

relevantSources.title: Internal Audit | Synchrony Global Careers
relevantSources.summary: Describes Synchrony's Internal Audit function that evaluates the effectiveness of risk management across the company, including AI-related risks.

relevantSources.title: AI Ethics in Financial Services Summit to Examine Challenges of Artificial Intelligence
relevantSources.summary: References an AI Ethics in Financial Services Summit examining governance and ethics challenges of AI use in financial services, which may include Synchrony's participation.

relevantSources.title: ENVIRONMENTAL, SOCIAL AND GOVERNANCE REPORT 2023
relevantSources.summary: Outlines how Synchrony's Board committees oversee ESG matters, including the Risk Committee's oversight of cybersecurity risks and the Technology Committee's review of technology-related innovation.

relevantSources.title: Paving the Way for Continuous Auditing Workflows in Financial Services with AI
relevantSources.summary: Discusses how AI-powered continuous auditing provides financial institutions with real-time anomaly detection and automated control testing, reducing manual workloads and enhancing accuracy.

Public Commitments & External Audits.findings: Synchrony Financial publicly documents its commitment to external validation and audit of its controls, including ESG reports, internal audit functions, and participation in industry summits on AI ethics. These sources confirm ongoing efforts to align with best practices and external standards for responsible AI.

summary.overallFindings: Synchrony Financial demonstrates comprehensive responsible AI practices across all seven pillars, with detailed public documentation of transparency, fairness, explainability, human oversight, privacy, governance, and external validation. The company provides concrete evidence of operational practices, oversight structures, and technical measures to ensure responsible AI deployment. No significant gaps were identified, and Synchrony aligns closely with best practices and external standards in responsible AI.
